column4: Is there someone that can answer a question about a seemingly broken dependancy in the lucid-main repo?
more specifically a tzdata-java dependancy on tzdata
only one way to find out --- ask
use pastebin for copy and paste to irc
please
http://pastebin.com/rdLtSW7K
have you ran sudo apt-get update and sudo apt-get safe-upgrade first?
i think after the apt-get update you would need then to run apt-get safe-upgrade but maybe i am mistaken
just installed with no problem on my 10.10 server x64
did u run a safe-upgrade to do a full update and it still failed?
apt-get safe-upgrade returns an error
im not understanding the question, sorry
im wondering what URL you have listed in your sources.list for the lucid main repository
im on 10.10
did u see my correction to command. sudo aptitude update then sudo aptitude safe-upgrade?
i seem to be seeing a problem with the repo: W: Failed to fetch http://us-east-1.ec2.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/dists/lucid-updates/main/source/Sources.bz2  Hash Sum mismatch
i have had that happen b4 and just run again and it goes threw, or did u try after first initial fail
any reason using 10.04 - i think u said was recent install, do you not wish to use 10.10?
no I dont. Its part of a service that has been tested on 10.04
k
could be. im still pretty newb so i am not fam w/ changing to a different one - glad u figured out
